text: Erik Sommers is an American television writer, television producer and screenwriter. ==Career== Erik Sommers began his career working as a production staff in Stark Raving Mad. During his time as a writer on American Dad, he met Chris McKenna, who would become his writing partner. ==Filmography== ===Television=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Film !! Credit !!
